content: **the pattern has been revised on the 14th of january 2026 please feel free to download a new copy ** **this pattern is gifted to you for a while if you take advantage of the free download i would appreciate a lot if you add the design to your list of favourites/heart it thank you so much<3** **the pattern** the pattern gives instructions for the sweater as well as for the pair of leggings **the sweater** the body of the sweater is worked bottom-up the sleeves are worked top-down the sweater is seamless the fine thing is that you may use many different colours for the stripes and choose one of them for the yoke and ribbed parts you can omit the stripes or the guernsey or both and use the pattern for a basic sweater there are so many possibilities let your fantasy and yarn set the limit **sizes** **size 1 newborn 3 mo** finished chest 42 cm/16 5 **size 2 6 mo 12 mo** finished chest 48 5 cm/19 **size 3 18 mo 2 years** finished chest 55 cm/21 75 **size 4 2 4 years** finished chest 62 cm/24 25 **size 5 5 6 years** finished chest 69 cm/27 **materials** **yarn ** i used yaku from camarose to work the sample balls of 50 gr/1 76 oz and 200 m/218 yards for the mc main colour i used 1003 natural and for the cc contrasting colour i used 1710 blue of this specific yarn you will need approximately 140/170/200/240/300 m = 155/185/220/265/330 yards of mc 100/130/160/190/220 m = 110/145/175/210/240 yards of cc **needles** 3 mm/us2 5 or needles to meet gauge **notions** 1 removable stitch-marker separate holders or waste-yarn tapestry needle blocking tools suitable for your yarn 3/3/4/4/5 buttons 12 mm/0 5 across **gauge** 30 sts and 38-40 row/rounds in stockinette sts = 10 x 10 cm/4 x 4 **the pair of leggings** the pair of leggings are worked top-down **sizes** new-born / 3 months / 6 9 months circumference of waist 40/44/50 cm = 16/17 5/20 this is before inserting the elastic ribbon circumference at widest point below the waist 44/47 5/55 5 cm = 17 25/18 75/21 75 length of legs 14/18/22 cm = 5 5/7/9 the sample is worked in the newborn size **materials** **yarn ** the leggings are worked using the same yarn as for the sweater details above under sweater of mc natural you will need approximately 70/110/150 m = 80/125/165 yards of cc blue you will need approximately 60/100/140 m = 70/110/155 yards **needles ** size 3 mm/us2 5 **notions** 8/10/12 buttons 10 mm/0 4 across an elastic ribbon for the waist
